bwwExcerpt: As Vivian, Davidson has a warm, engaging, and highly likable energy that drives the show, not to mention a luminous smile and lungs of steel. Two of her vocal highlights are "Anywhere but Here" and "I Can't Go Back", where she uses her vocal and storytelling talent to really make you root for her character. She also moves wonderfully, whether she's casually grooving in a bathrobe in Edward's penthouse suite, or swept up in partnering in "Don't Forget to Dance". Adam Pascal is appropriately reser
